name: Gateway inn Puluong
address: Don village, Bá Thước, Thanh Hoá, Thanh Hóa, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Thanh Hóa, Gateway inn Puluong cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 2 sao có xe đạp miễn phí, khu vườn và sân hiên. Chỗ nghỉ này có các tiện nghi như máy ATM và dịch vụ giặt khô, cùng với Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp dịch vụ phòng, quầy lễ tân 24 giờ và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Khách sạn có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn à la carte mỗi buổi sáng.

Gateway inn Puluong có sân chơi trẻ em.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Thọ Xuân, cách chỗ nghỉ 88 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: Amazing stay with attentive staff. Breakfast was excellent, room was clean with perfect view. We enjoyed very quiet and relaxing time here. Definitely come back soon!

review.room_type: Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: We were recommended by our friends about this homestay, and what a fortunate find it was! The exceptional view left us in awe, while the meals were both delicious and satisfying. The room was impeccably clean, making our stay comfortable and enjoyable. A hidden gem worth discovering!

review.room_type: Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: The homestay exceeded our expectations! The strong WiFi kept me connected, while the breathtaking views took my breath away. The best part? The delicious lunch and dinner options served during my trip. The attentive staff made my stay even more memorable. Highly recommended!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Tầm Nhìn
review.comment_positive:
Super nice place with exceptional view. Breakfast was good, wifi was strong, room was extremely clean and the host was amazing to help and support us during our stay.
Definitely come back again soon!

review.rating: Exceptional view, really nice staff and good food.
review.room_type: Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: The staff is really nice, super clean, good food and beautiful view. They provide motorbike rental service but walking to the rice field just 10 min aways is really nice. Location is easy to reach from Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: Regarding the location, it is just on the main road, so you can hear the trucks pass.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Tầm Nhìn
review.comment_positive:
Clean room and comfortable bed.
Beautyful view, it is a lucky day.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Super nice place! The breakfast was diverse and delicious, with attentive staff. The spacious and clean rooms provided a comfortable retreat, incorporating local culture in their design. The exceptional service from the warm and friendly staff made me feel valued and well taken care of. The inn's location amidst the stunning landscapes of Pu Luong offered breathtaking views and served as a perfect base for exploration. Puluong Inn is a standout choice for those seeking a memorable stay, combining great breakfast, clean rooms, and exceptional service in the heart of Pu Luong

review.room_type: Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive:
Personnels aux petits soins, superbe séjour, très bon rapport qualité-prix.
Super emplacement.
Je recommande

review.room_type: Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: Personnel aux petits soins, superbe emplacement, très bon rapport qualité-prix.
